name: Animals Train for Toddlers Fun
description:
Fun and simple arcade game for toddlers. If Your totddler like train and animals this game is perfect choice.

In first part of the game, kid must solve simple puzzle with animals. After that Your toddler can choose between animals and have fun playing with arcade jumping game.

Collect coins and have fun.

The game is without advertisements. Safe and simple for Your toddler.
